attributes.title: stilling my information
attributes.review: I’m scared please help please I’m begging you this is not good it shows how to harm your self and sell drugs to little kids I saw people buying guns and killing lil kids and killing dogs please help I’m scared my kids are 15 and 8 I will be taking this to court

attributes.title: Trump Supporters Beware!
attributes.review: This app was secretly developed in a high-tech gen z lab to track and take down Trump supporters! I tried to download the app and IMMEDIATELY started receiving phone calls from liberal groups trying to get my money/support. Don’t fall for this scam!!

attributes.title: Stay away from this app!!! Think twice before you download!!!
attributes.review: It took a whole year to download after it did it took up so much space I had to delete all of my pictures. Anyway once I logged in the app I think it hacked me like for real my phone was glitching and it blew up. A few days after that all of my social media apps started posting stuff about trump 2020 at first I just thought somehow my Karen mom hacked into my phone but later on I figured out it was this app. Many others have had this problem and I think this app should get deleted I feel personally attacked about this and don’t think it was very plus ultra of this app. My phone is now burnt to a crisp and all of my friends think I’m being held captive and am being forced to say these things. Again I think it would be awesome If this app got deleted thank you very much.

attributes.title: WILL DESTROY YOUR PHONE
attributes.review: If you like your phone you won’t like this app. It is loaded with viruses and spam. As soon as I downloaded it my phone slowed down like crazy even my battery is worse now. I only had it for a day before I had to delete. Doesn’t even deserve one star
